mapper.select: select * from noticebo where not_writer='관리자' order by not_no desc limit #{begin}, 10
select count(*) from noticebo where not_writer='관리자'
mapper.insert: insert into noticebo(not_title, not_date, not_hit, not_writer, not_content) values(#{not_title}, #{not_date}, 0, #{not_writer}, #{not_content})
mapper.select: select * from noticebo where not_writer='관리자' and not_no=#{not_no}
mapper.update: update noticebo set not_hit = not_hit +1 where not_no=#{not_no}
update noticebo set not_title=#{not_title}, not_content=#{not_content} where not_no=#{not_no}
